name: S.C.P.H
description:
The game takes place inside a children's psychiatric hospital. All the events transpiring inside are hidden from the public. The main experimentation that the doctor wants to work on is the DS-1 Experiment. The only problem is that in order to part take in the experiment a willing subject must be present and his despair must be at a high level.

After something goes wrong and an explosion occurs all cell doors open due to the facilities power going off for a few minutes. The children take advantage of all the chaos occurring to finally escape.
